mapper.select:
select t1.indickey,indicname,indicdes,freq,indicattr,indictype,facttable,savedays,callevel,flag,creator,create_dt,isjl,region_num,region_sf
from mm11_indic t1,MM12_EVENT_INDIC t2
where t1.indickey=t2.indickey and flag='1' and indictype = #{indictype} and callevel = #{callevel} and freq = #{freq}
and t2.eventkey in
( select distinct t1.eventkey
from mm12_event t1,MM14_LINK_EVENT t2, mm14_model t3
where t1.eventkey=t2.eventkey and t2.modelkey=t3.modelkey and t3.modelkey=#{modelkey}
and t1.flag = '1'
and t1.eventkey not in
( select distinct t1.eventkey from mm12_event t1,MM14_LINK_EVENT t2, mm14_model t3 where t1.eventkey=t2.eventkey and t2.modelkey=t3.modelkey and t3.flag='5' and t1.freq =#{freq} and t1.flag = '1' ) )
